trans-unit.source: Support in the Azure Tools for Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Support in the Azure Tools for Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: Service Bus Support in Azure Tools for Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Service Bus Support in Azure Tools for Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: The <token>wazvstools1</token> includes a <token>sb2</token> project template type, <newTerm>Azure Worker Role with Service Bus Queue</newTerm>.
trans-unit.target: The <token>wazvstools1</token> includes a <token>sb2</token> project template type, <newTerm>Azure Worker Role with Service Bus Queue</newTerm>.

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <token>wazvstools2</token> add support for <token>sb2</token> in the <token>vs_current_short</token> Server Explorer.
trans-unit.target: In addition, the <token>wazvstools2</token> add support for <token>sb2</token> in the <token>vs_current_short</token> Server Explorer.

trans-unit.source: For more information about project templates in the <token>wazvstools1</token>, see <externalLink><linkText>Creating an Azure Project with Visual Studio</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ee405487.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about project templates in the <token>wazvstools1</token>, see <externalLink><linkText>Creating an Azure Project with Visual Studio</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ee405487.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: This section describes how to use the <token>sb2</token> project template, and how to use Server Explorer to manage <token>sb2</token> resources.
trans-unit.target: This section describes how to use the <token>sb2</token> project template, and how to use Server Explorer to manage <token>sb2</token> resources.

trans-unit.source: Azure Tools for Microsoft Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Azure Tools for Microsoft Visual Studio
